Home.offer1desc: We'll make you a firstclass web with a modern design using the newest technologies.
Home.offer2desc: Do you want to present a product, a service or just forward a webpage? The solution is a lowcost microwebsite.
Home.offer3desc: Do you have an old web? We offer you a redesign and content update so that your web will keep up with the trends.
Home.offer4desc: We'll make you a complex web with custom content administration and advanced features.
Home.ourProjectsIoana: Simple presentational web of a designer
Home.ourProjectsBlog: Editable blog with custom admin menu
Home.ourProjectsLibro: Custom social network with Pusher chat
Home.reviewsIoana: Peter succeeded to make me a website with professionalism promptitude, good quality and reasonable price. I am very happy with the result. Thank you Peter ❤️.
Home.reviewsTom: Cooperation with Peter is excellent, great communication and result. He enjoys his job, does it honestly and thoroughly. I definitely count on him in my next projects.
Home.reviewsLeo: I have been working with Peter for many years in different areas and I am always pleased by his friendly approach and willingness to help. Thank you.
Home.reviewsMich: If you are looking for someone reliable and smart, Peter is your man. I am very satisfied with his work and recommend working with him.
Home.reviewsSam: Excellent cooperation, easy understanding of my requests and comments, flexible for options that were subject to my decision.
